mapper.select: SELECT bidNo, auctionNo, userNo, bidPrice, bidDate, pAddress, rAddress, rName, rPhone FROM Bid WHERE auctionNo = #{auctionNo} ORDER BY bidPrice
SELECT bidNo, auctionNo, userNo, bidPrice, bidDate, pAddress, rAddress, rName, rPhone FROM Bid WHERE userNo = #{userNo}
SELECT bidNo, auctionNo, userNo, bidPrice, bidDate, pAddress, rAddress, rName, rPhone FROM Bid WHERE bidNo = #{bidNo}
SELECT bidNo, auctionNo, userNo, bidPrice, bidDate, pAddress, rAddress, rName, rPhone FROM Bid WHERE auctionNo = 200 and bidPrice = (select Max(bidPrice) from bid where AUCTIONNO = #{auctionNo});
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Bid (bidNo, auctionNo, userNo, bidPrice, bidDate, pAddress, rAddress, rName, rPhone) VALUES (#{bidNo}, #{auctionNo}, #{bidUserNo}, #{bidPrice}, sysdate, #{pAddress}, #{rAddress}, #{rName}, #{rPhone})
